  • Method Details

    • setBoard

      void setBoard(int[][] board)
      Set sudoku board, numbers 1-9 are fixed values, 0 is unsolved.
      Parameters:
      board - a board to copy values from
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if board is invalid, e.g. not 9x9
